AT.name: Nintendo präsentiert New Style Boutique™
AT.description: In „Nintendo präsentiert: New Style Boutique“ schlüpfen Spieler in die Haut eines Verkäufers und arbeiten sich auf der Karriereleiter nach oben, bis sie eine eigene Boutique besitzen, indem sie Kunden beraten und Ensembles für diese zusammenstellen. Du kannst aus Tausenden von Kleidungsstücken und Accessoires auswählen und deine Outfits bewerten lassen – ideal für alle, die ihrem inneren Modedrang nachgeben wollen! Erklimme den Modehimmel und erobere die Modewelt im Sturm!

AU.name: Nintendo presents New Style Boutique™
AU.description: In Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique, players take on the role of a shop assistant and must work their way up to eventually owning their own boutique by giving customers advice and putting a look together for them. There are thousands of items and accessories to choose from, and players can also get judged on the looks they put together, great for anybody wanting to unleash their inner fashionista! Reach the top of the style stakes and take the fashion world by storm!

BG.name: Nintendo presents New Style Boutique™
BG.description: In Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique, players take on the role of a shop assistant and must work their way up to eventually owning their own boutique by giving customers advice and putting a look together for them. There are thousands of items and accessories to choose from, and players can also get judged on the looks they put together, great for anybody wanting to unleash their inner fashionista! Reach the top of the style stakes and take the fashion world by storm!

BE.name: Nintendo présente La Nouvelle Maison du Style™
BE.description: Dans Nintendo présente : La Nouvelle Maison du Style, vous commencez en tant qu'assistante. Aidez vos clients à trouver leur style pour vous faire un nom et finalement gérer votre propre boutique. Faites votre choix parmi des milliers d'articles et accessoires. Vous serez jugée sur les tenues que vous créez alors laissez la reine du style qui est en vous s'exprimer ! Devenez la reine du style et faites-vous un nom dans le monde de la mode !

movies.name: La Nouvelle Maison du Style™ : bande-annonce

ES.name: Nintendo presenta New Style Boutique™
ES.description: En Nintendo presenta: New Style Boutique los jugadores encarnarán a una dependienta de una tienda de ropa y trabajarán duro para conseguir abrir su propia boutique aconsejando qué comprar a sus clientes. Hay miles de prendas y accesorios entre los que elegir, y los jugadores también podrán presentar sus estilismos a concurso. El juego perfecto para desarrollar al "fashionista" que hay en ti. Demuestra tu estilazo y deslumbra en la pasarela de la moda.

IT.name: Nintendo presenta New Style Boutique™
IT.description: In Nintendo presenta: New Style Boutique, i giocatori si cimentano nel ruolo di una commessa che deve fare carriera per poter eventualmente diventare proprietaria di una boutique tutta sua, dando ai clienti i giusti consigli, e creando il look perfetto per ognuno. Ci sono tantissimi capi ed accessori tra cui scegliere, e potrai anche scegliere di far giudicare i look che crei, per scatenare lo spirito fashionista che c'è in te! Raggiungi il top delle classifiche e conquista il mondo della moda!

NL.name: Nintendo presents New Style Boutique™
NL.description: In Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique begin je als winkelassistent en is je doel om uiteindelijk eigenaar van je eigen boetiek te worden door klanten advies te geven en hen te voorzien van een 'look'. Er zijn duizenden artikelen en accessoires om uit te kiezen en je kunt ook beoordeeld worden op de ensembles die je samenstelt. Geweldig voor de meest modebewuste spelers! Ontwikkel je stijlgevoel en verover de modewereld!

NZ.name: Nintendo presents New Style Boutique™

PL.name: Nintendo presents New Style Boutique™

There are thousands of items and accessories to choose from, and players can also get judged on the looks they put together, great for anybody wanting to unleash their inner fashionista! Reach the top of the style stakes and take the fashion world by storm!

PT.name: Nintendo presents New Style Boutique™
PT.description: Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique convida-te a assumires o papel de um assistente de loja cuja tarefa é escolher o tipo de roupa adequado para cada cliente, com base no seu pedido específico ou na sua personalidade. O objetivo é conseguir uma combinação de peças de roupa e acessórios que forme um coordenado de que os clientes gostem e que tornem a tua loja cada vez mais popular. Prepara-te para demonstrares o fashionista que há em ti! Triunfa no mundo da moda com o teu sentido de estilo único!

RU.name: Nintendo presents New Style Boutique™
RU.description: Эта игра доступна только на английском, французском, итальянском, немецком и испанском языках. В Nintendo presents: New Style Boutique игрокам предстоит начать работу продавцом в магазине одежды и подняться по карьерной лестнице, чтобы в конечном итоге открыть свой бутик. Вы сможете давать советы покупателям, создавать и дополнять их образ. Вам будут предоставлены тысячи моделей одежды и аксессуаров, дана возможность видеть и оценивать коллекции других игроков, самому становиться законадателем моды, в полной мере раскрыв свои способности! Мир моды у ваших ног!
